sys_metadata_link.payload:
0 The limitations of size mean that most micro-rockets lack the fuel capacity to reach distant targets.  However, high-yield fuel cells, advanced filtration systems, or staged boosters added to the rockets can all increase a rocket's effective range substantially.  Of course, the term "effective range" becomes something of a misnomer with rockets modified in this way, as the additional fuel risks unbalancing the rocket's flight path, and the increased range comes with an increased chance of misjudgment on the part of the user.  However, the chance to deliver a hefty payload beyond the reach of equivalent retribution is worth the risk to many.  This attachment can be installed on any micro-rocket.

Models Include: SoroSuub HV-33 Fuel Filter.

Base Modifiers: Increases the weapon's range by one range band.  Adds the Inaccurate (+2) quality to the weapon.

Modification Options: 1 increase weapon's range by one additional range band mod, 2 reduce the weapon's Inaccurate quality by 1 mods.  

]]> 1 Staged Rocket Booster (Micro-Rocket only) GEAR0001221 25 2 x_176383_star_wars_gear ben.fisher 2022-01-27 17:43:57 0ed039bd2f958110e0f497eef699b617 0 ben.fisher 2022-01-27 17:43:57 mod
